title: 'Despicable and reprehensible': China lashes out at UK expansion of visa scheme following Jimmy Lai conviction
summary_full: The diplomatic tensions came after pro-democracy tycoon Jimmy Lai was sentenced for 20 years in one of the city's most prominent prosecutions.
summary_public: The diplomatic tensions came after pro-democracy tycoon Jimmy Lai was sentenced for 20 years in one of the city's most prominent prosecutions.
